      protected java.util.List<Store> getStoresFromZk()
      HelixReadOnlyZKSharedSystemStoreRepository is overriding this function to filter out stores, which are not necessary to put a watch against during refresh(), and if this logic to refresh the zk store repository gets changed in the future, we need to update HelixReadOnlyZKSharedSystemStoreRepository accordingly.

      • getStoresFromZk

        protected java.util.List<Store> getStoresFromZk()
        HelixReadOnlyZKSharedSystemStoreRepository is overriding this function to filter out stores, which are not necessary to put a watch against during refresh(), and if this logic to refresh the zk store repository gets changed in the future, we need to update HelixReadOnlyZKSharedSystemStoreRepository accordingly.
